attributes.action: Fund evacuation of Afghans, with UK relocation offers, trapped in Afghanistan
attributes.additional_details: We promised these people safety, nearly a year on from the withdrawal it's time to make good on that promise.
attributes.background: We call on the UK Government to fund safe evacuation routes from Afghanistan to the UK for all Afghans with offers to relocate to the United Kingdom.
